short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for organizing user's appointments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YesAppointment is an extension designed to help users organize their appointments more efficiently. Here are some of its key features:

Add Appointments: Users can add appointments to their schedule by entering the date and time in a user-friendly format using the date-time picker. Once an appointment is added, it is automatically saved to the user's browser storage and displayed in the appointment list.

Notification: The extension sets a notification for each appointment, which reminds the user about the upcoming appointment five minutes before it is scheduled to start. The notification includes the title of the appointment, and a message saying "Appointment coming up in 5 minutes!".

View Appointments: Users can view all of their saved appointments in a simple, organized list, which shows the date and time of each appointment. The appointment list is saved in the browser's storage, so users can easily view their appointments across browser sessions.

Edit or Delete Appointments: Users can edit or delete appointments from the appointment list as per their convenience. If they need to change the date or time of an appointment, they can simply edit it, and the updated appointment will be saved in the browser storage.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension has a simple, user-friendly interface, which makes it easy for users to add, view, edit, and delete appointments. The appointment list is displayed in a clear, organized format, and the date-time picker makes it easy to add new appointments.

Overall, YesAppointment is a useful tool for anyone who needs to keep track of their appointments, whether it's for work, school, or personal life. Its notification system ensures that users never miss an appointment again, and its user-friendly interface makes it easy to manage appointments and keep track of their schedule.
